T02D3413:80a-1: shr'i kharsa p'a na s'a dha nam /
T02D3413:80a-3: dpal ldan mkha' spyod kyi sgrub thabs /
T02D3413:80a-4: dpal ldan mkha' spyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3413:80b-0: @80b dang por re zhig sngags pas stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D3413:80b-1: rang gi snying gar pam yig yongs su gyur pa las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02D3413:80b-2: de'i steng du aa yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D3413:80b-3: de'i steng du hr'i:yig las 'od zer bltas te /
T02D3413:80b-4: 'od zer des 'og min gyi sa la zhugs te ;
T02D3413:80b-5: 'jig rten dbang phyug gdan drangs nas mdun gyi nam
T02D3413:80b-6: mkha'i mthil du bltas te sdig pa bshags pa la
T02D3413:80b-7: sogs pa bya'o // 'di lta ste sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D3413:80b-8: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3413:80b-9: bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02D3413:80b-10: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3413:80b-13: byang chub tu sems bskyed par byas nas /
T02D3413:80b-14: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3413:80b-19: de nas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3413:80b-20: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa
T02D3413:80b-21: a'atma ko& ham zhes pas rang gi lus gzugs brnyan
T02D3413:80b-23: snying ga'i dbus su pam yig las skyes pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02D3413:80b-24: de'i steng du aa yig las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3413:80b-25: de'i steng du hr'i:yig dmar po'i 'od zer gyis de
T02D3413:80b-26: bzhin gshegs pa rnams bkug cing bcug nas bdag nyid
T02D3413:80b-27: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su bsgom par bya
T02D3413:80b-28: ste / sku mdog dkar po ral pa'i cod pan can /
T02D3413:80b-30: cig shos na padma dkar po bsnams pa /
T02D3413:80b-31: skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D3413:80b-32: 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan can /
T02D3413:80b-33: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa /
T02D3413:80b-34: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa /
T02D3413:80b-35: zla ba'i gdan la zla ba'i 'od lta bu'i bdag nyid rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3413:80b-36: de'i g-yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma dang nor bzangs /
T02D3413:80b-37: g-yon du khro gnyer can dang rta mgrin /
T02D3413:80b-38: shar du rnam par snang mdzad /
T02D3413:80b-41: byang du don yod grub pa rnams so //
T02D3413:80b-43: bden bral du m'a ma k'i /
T02D3413:80b-45: dbang ldan du rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma rnams so //
T02D3413:80b-46: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis
T02D3413:80b-47: ye shes sems dpa' dgug cing rab tu gzhug par
T02D3413:81a-0: bya'o // mig la sogs pa byin gyis @81a * //
T02D3413:81a-2: lus dang ngag dang yid byin gyis brlabs nas dbang bskur ba zhu bar bya'o //
T02D3413:81a-3: ji ltar 'khrungs tsam nyid nas ni //
T02D3413:81a-4: de bzhin gshegs rnams khrus gsol ba //
T02D3413:81a-5: lha yi chu bo dag pa yis //
T02D3413:81a-6: de bzhin bdag kyang khrus mdzad gsol //
T02D3413:81a-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka
T02D3413:81a-8: ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um phat sv'a h'a
T02D3413:81a-9: / spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bcu yang
T02D3413:81a-10: dag par spros nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas
